channel.title: Hugo Demo Website :: Hugo Demo
channel.description: This is a homepage! I can use MARKDOWN to edit the page ​ src/javascript.js const string = "It does syntax highlighting!"; cosnt updated = "I can even highlight invididual lines": It can also do math (LaTeX) $$\left( \sum_{k=1}^n a_k b_k \right)^2 \leq \left( \sum_{k=1}^n a_k^2 \right) \left( \sum_{k=1}^n b_k^2 \right)$$ Callout Box I can make a pretty obvious callout box!

item.title: Syllabus
item.description: Hugo Demo Syllabus CC 515 - Full Stack Web Development Syllabus Boilerplate here Learning Outcomes Learn Something New Academic Honesty Custom Policies This is a custom version of the Academic Honesty syllabus policy Kansas State University has an Honor and Integrity System based on personal integrity, which is presumed to be sufficient assurance that, in academic matters, one’s work is performed honestly and without unauthorized assistance. Undergraduate and graduate students, by registration, acknowledge the jurisdiction of the Honor and Integrity System.
